import React, { Component } from 'react' class AddReply extends Component { handleClick = (e) => { const el = e.target.closest('div') const targetEl = el.previousSibling const closeIcon = el.nextSibling // const closeTag = targetEl.style.display = 'block' // reply field el.style.display = 'none' closeIcon.style.display = 'block' // close icon } removeText = (e) => { console.log("focus:", e) } removeInput = (e) => { const el = e.target.closest('div') const targetEl = el.previousSibling targetEl.previousSibling.style.display = 'none' // reply field targetEl.style.display = 'block' // reply button } render() { return(
{/* */}
write a reply...
reply
clear
) } } export default AddReply
